about-name:
This App was created to learn Progressive Web Applications.
Hence, the inspiration for the name.
about-not-logged-in:
Not logged in.
Go to (url)[settings]
to log in.
about-tool:
A tool to log multiple Adventure Lab<sup>Â®</sup>s in a single walk/ride.
Not missing a point from a different one while doing some adventure.
donate-scan: Scan or click on the QR code:
friends-description: Double click on the birds name for more information.
friends-duck-description: You don't have or want to spent much money, but still like to support us. We love you, don't let anybody tell you you're lame.
friends-eagle-description: With your sharp eyes, you can select the labs you want.
friends-not-registered: Not registered or already has friends
friends-peacock-description: You want to show off? Fine with us, thank you for your generous contribution.
friends-pinguin-description: You live in the antarctic, no wonder you're so cool you want to support us. Thank you.
friends-warning:
Unchecking friends for a donation,
will remove them from the inventory
and with that powers they have.
help-geofence-circles: The circles on the map show the size of the geofence.
help-geofence-distance: This distance shown is the distance to the geofence.
help-geofence-input:
The input bar is active when inside the geofence.
It becomes inactive upon leaving the geofence.
Exception is when the lab is "red": 
Meaning wrong answers can be corrected outside the geofence.
help-labs-number:
A maximum number of labs, depending on the donation status, can be loaded.
When this number of labs in (/)[block size] is too big the alembic shakes.
The globe shakes when the number of labs to be displayed on the map exceeds the limit.
help-loaded: All labs in a (*)[square] of (/)[block size] as entered in the settings are loaded.
help-logging: Labs can be logged when there is an answer in the input bar.
help-map-cross-hairs:
Clicking on the cross-hairs wil center the map on the current position.
Double-clicking will keep the map centered.
help-map-move: When moving over a significant distance, new adventures are loaded.
help-map-zoom: Moving and zooming the map also does load other adventures.
help-notification-click: Clicking on the notification will open the corresponding lab.
help-notification-disrance:
(/)[Notif. dist.] is the distance from the geofence
at which a notification will be triggered.
When set to 0, no notifications will be given.
help-notification-distance: (/)[Notif. dist.] is the distance from the geofence at which a notification will be triggered.
help-notification-open:
Due to limitations of progressive web apps,
notifications will only be shown when the app is open.
help-update-interval:
(/)[Update interval] is the time between two updates of the position.
When set to 0 the position is updated
when your device detects a change in location.
labs-no-adventures-explanation:
No Adventures near.
Go to a more interesting place,
Or increase the block size.
paypal-support:
Support the development of (PowerWalkAdventure)[]
by buying a friend.
qr-scan:
Scan the QR Code to install
(PowerWalkAdventure)[]
on your device.
settings-unauthenticated:
Enter your geocaching.com credentials
to be able to log labs
and see your logged labs.
See (info)[] for more information.
